Website: -
 " This screen contains all the routes you can follow 
 
 The buttons: 
 You got 3 filter buttons: 
 - all: all the routes available 
 - complete: the routes you have already completed 
 - incomplete: the routes you have yet to complete" " This screen contains all the sights you can visit
 
 The buttons: 
 You got 3 filter buttons: 
 - all: all the sights that are available 
 - visited: the sights you have visited before 
 - unvisited: the sights you have yet to visit" " This screen shows you information about the selected sight
 
 It contains tags if you want some additional information.
 
 It also has a checkbox if you have seen this sight already.
 
 You can press the globe if you want to see this sight on the map.
 
 The compass will take you to the routes." " This screen contains information about the selected route
 
 It has tags for additional information.
 
 A description about the route.
 
 And a list of all the points in this route,
 you can click on a point for detailed information."
Are you sure you want to walk this route again? Are you sure you want to start this route? Are you sure you want to stop this route? Would you like to continue the route? No Yes
